page.title: 15Beckingham(Lincs) _ Clubs 3
page.content: {Beckingham Cricket Club { _______________________ The club has a playing membership of some 20 members plus associate members which includes older past players. The team competes in the Newark and District Evening League, which includes teams within a fifteen mile radius of Newark. At the weekends, matches are arranged between local villages, this helps to promote community spirit. Families and villagers turn out to watch these games. Whilst the parents watch the cricket the children enjoy themselves on the swings and slides. At the end of the playing season the club holds a presentation evening. Awards are presented to outstanding players and the evening is usually a successful social event, this being a fitting end to a season's sport.
